A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"Star Wars: The Last Jedi (2017)\" features some of the best scenes in the series\, and I think the first act is really solid. The only real complaints I have about the rest of the film involve the thread given to \"Finn\" and \"Rose.\" While it has good intentions\, the writing isn't the strongest\, leaving the actors to do the best they can with what to have to work with.
